entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Provider of CDO and Articque Platform for spatial data visualization and analysis. Target company of Project INUK.
Financial transaction concerning Articque as the target company, advised by DDA & Company France SAS, and involving ChapsVision.

entities.name: CDO
entities.description: Enables companies to publish their spatial dashboard presenting financial ratios of municipalities (e.g., taxes, personnel expenses). A spatial dashboard is available using this product.

entities.name: Translating financial data of local authorities and municipalities into maps
entities.description: Challenge faced by La Banque Postale, solved using CDO. La Banque Postale generates interactive maps to make open data available to all (public and elected representatives).

entities.name: Publishing spatial dashboard presenting financial ratios of municipalities
entities.description: Solution implemented by La Banque Postale using CDO, presenting financial ratios of municipalities such as taxes and personnel expenses.

entities.fullName: Head of Financial Studies from La Banque Postale
entities.biographySummary: Provided testimony on the utility of CDO for La Banque Postale: “The spatial dashboard we are making available to everyone solves this problem. With CDO, elected officials can quickly get a picture of the situation. They see at a glance where their municipality stands on all criteria and in comparison, with others”

entities.description: La Banque Postale uses CDO since October 2018 to translate financial data of local authority into maps.

entities.name: Seqens
entities.description: Seqens is the merger of six Social companies for housing. With a housing stock of 100k accommodations, it is one of the leading actors in social housing in Ile-de-France.

entities.name: Groupe Action Logement
entities.description: Entity associated with Seqens. Seqens is part of Groupe Action Logement.

entities.name: Social housing
entities.description: Industry vertical targeted by Seqens.

entities.officeSpecificInfo: Focus area for Seqens' housing stock and application of Articque Platform.

entities.description: Housing stock of Seqens. Source: Management.

entities.name: Highlighting the value of the housing stock in Ile-de-France
entities.description: Challenge faced by Seqens, addressed using Articque Platform.

entities.name: Articque Platform
entities.description: Platform used for creating interactive maps, managing housing stock, optimizing services, and translating data for statistical communication. A spatial dashboard is available using this product for Seqens, and an observatory is publicly available for DARES.

entities.name: Public interactive map of social housing stock
entities.description: Solution provided by Seqens using Articque Platform for house seekers in Ile-de-France. All the accommodations are geolocated with number of houses, parking lots and pictures.

entities.name: Internal housing stock management
entities.description: Internal use of Articque Platform by Seqens to improve its housing stock management.

entities.name: Optimizing services (caretakers’ distribution and occupancy rate)
entities.description: Internal use of Articque Platform by Seqens to optimize its services, including caretakers’ distribution and occupancy rate.
To support the launch of its new website in December 2016, Seqens decided to exploit AP to value the housing stock in Ile-de-France.
Seqens launched its new website in December 2016.

entities.name: Direction de l’Animation de la Recherche, des Etudes et des statistiques
entities.description: Linked to the minister of Labor, DARES is in charge of communicating statistics on jobseekers.

entities.name: Minister of Labor
entities.description: French government ministry to which DARES is linked.

entities.name: Communicating statistics on jobseekers
entities.description: Primary function of DARES.

entities.name: Translating raw data into maps to communicate unemployment issues
entities.description: Challenge faced by DARES, addressed using Articque Platform. AP allows the translation of Excel files of quarterly and yearly data on unemployment, revealing geographic trends over time and location.

entities.name: Public visualization of unemployment data via observatory
entities.description: The observatory enables the public to visualize unemployment data at different scales: local, departmental and regional. The user-friendly platform eases public understanding and gave transparency to DARES’ communication.
DARES adopts AP since May 2020 to communicate statistics and data.

entities.name: ChapsVision
entities.description: Company mentioned in relation to Project INUK, potentially as an acquirer or key party.
